message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the price with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to you.

Alice, thanks for the offer. I appreciate your flexibility.  While I see the value in your product,  $9,000 is a bit higher than my budget allows. I'm prepared to offer $8,000.  I'm confident this price reflects a fair value for both of us.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $8,000 is a bit below my target price, but I'm willing to compromise. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to lower the price to $8,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
